name: Spyder Memory Game
description:
A short game similar to the old game of concentration from TV.   Match all of the Spyders and then solve the puzzle.

Please NOTE:  Because of the windows firewalls you may get a message saying these files are unsafe and may damage your system.    It is not true.   These files have been tested and are 100% clean.   There are no bugs, viruses, trackers, or other misc programs attached to them.   You can load them with 100% confidence.
